e: ￹`Pina~ `a~ `foting~ `ko~ `ma~`ala~`ay~ `namo~?￺How many fish did you get?￻你們捕到多少魚？
￹`Caay~ `ka~ `pina~ `ko~ `ma~`ala~`ay~ `niyam~.￺We didn't get many.￻我們沒有捕到很多
￹`Papi~`na~ `ko~ `paro~ `no~ `loma'~ `namo~?￺How many members are in your family?￻你們家有幾口人？
￹`Tayra~ `ko~ `papi~`napina~ `ita~ `a~ `mi~`holol~.￺Let's several of us go and visit.￻有幾個人去拜訪
￹`Kinapina~ / `kinapi~`napina~ `kako~ `a~ `mi~`licay~ `ci~`ngraan~￺I asked him a number of times.￻我問他好幾次
d.f: ￹￺more than two or three￻比二或三多一點
